Class ReservationSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • Database
      • ReservationSystem

  • public class ReservationSystem
extends Database
    The Reservation System is the main class that holds the entry point in the program. The main point of this class is to prompt questions for the user, add people to the database, remove people from the database print manifest and print availability of seats.
    Since:
    2/18/2017
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mebin Skaria

                                java.lang.String section,
                                java.lang.String pref)
        Function for Reserving a Passenger.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the passenger.
        section - Economy or First.
        pref - [W]indow,[C]enter,[A]isle.
        Returns:
        If successfully reserved a passenger will return true, else will return false.
